dict.string: swimming pool~noun~feminine|Où et la piscine?|Where is the swimming pool
to buy~verb|Où est-ce que je peux acheter des œufs?|Where can I buy eggs?
dirt bin~noun~masculine|Où se trouve les pubelles?|Where are the dirt bins?
toilet block~noun~masculine|Un camping avec le bloc sanitaire|A campsite with a toilet block
